summary: Add 2 sets of high resolution male only and female only armor to the game.
descriptionHtml:
>Contractor Armor

This mod add a new set of High Resolution Light Armor to the game.It's MALE Only.

Understand that the Mask/hood was tailored to humanoid faces therefore not for Kathjit nor Argonians.
There is also an enchanted version geared toward stealth included.

Armor Defense Base Ratings:
-Gloves:13
-Boots:13
-Mask only:15
-Hood:3
-Mask+Hood:18
-Cuirass long:39
-Cuirass short:38

*Enchanted version:
-Mask,hood,masked hood : fortify sneak by 30%
-Cuirass long and short : fortify healing by 30%
-Gloves: double sneak attack damage
-Boots: muffled steps

>Mavari Armor

This mod add a new set of High Resolution Light Armor to the game.It's FEMALE Only.

The armor is based on an original 2d concept art made by Virginie Carquin.You can check her deviantart page here: http://virginiecarquin.deviantart.com/
and her work used as reference here:http://virginiecarquin.deviantart.com/art/Vigilance-372753929

Armor Defense Base Ratings:
-Gloves:15
-Boots:15
-Cuirass:38

*Where to find it
-In a guarded Locked Chest(the key is with 1 of the guardian) located South-west of WhiteRun near the Lady Stone.(isle in the middle of the lake,check the Map/location pics).

-To any forge assuming you have the advanced armor smithing perk(armor pieces are in the steel category).The armor is temper-able too.

*Installation
To install Just extract the contents(including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder.Comes with an esp file you can check and uncheck in the launch menu.
